definition:
A topological space $X$ is said to be *fully* $T_4$ if every open cover
of $X$ has star refinement.

A topological space is said to be *fully normal* if it is a $T_1$ space
and is fully $T_4$.

For example, every pseudometric space is fully $T_4$.

We have the following implications:

Lindelöf $T_3 \Rightarrow$ paracompact and $T_3 \Rightarrow$ fully
$T_4 \Rightarrow T_4 \Rightarrow$ uniformizable $\Rightarrow T_3$ ,

and

fully normal $\Leftrightarrow$ paracompact regular.
